badges.title: DirectX Defiler: Compatibility Conqueror
badges.description: Awarded for running a RustChain validator or GUI interface on a system with DirectX 8.1 or earlier. You didn't run DirectX — you *dragged* it through the registry and made it obey.

emotional_resonance.trigger: dxdiag confirmed DirectX presence + legacy validator GUI launch

badges.visual_anchor: cracked CRT with glowing 'DX Compatibility Achieved' under AGP firelight
